meanings.definition: The quality of being appropriate or fitting.
meanings.sent1: Her outfit's patnesses made her stand out at the party.
meanings.sent2: The patnesses of his remarks impressed the audience.
meanings.sent3: The patnesses of wearing a swimsuit to a snowball fight made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: His choice of words had a patnesses that resonated with the listeners.
meanings.sent5: The patnesses of the puzzle pieces fitting together perfectly was satisfying.

meanings.definition: The state of being timely or opportune.
meanings.sent1: The patnesses of her arrival saved the day.
meanings.sent2: His patnesses in bringing an umbrella prevented him from getting wet.
meanings.sent3: The patnesses of finding a sale on winter coats in summer was a lucky break.
meanings.sent4: The patnesses of the traffic light turning green just as he approached was a stroke of luck.
meanings.sent5: The patnesses of the rain stopping just before the outdoor event was a relief.
